skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: forest night
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Forest Night by Sleep Jar® plays sleep sounds and ambient sounds to help you sleep, relax, meditate, relieve stress, or block out unwanted noise.

Forest Night is part of the Sleep Jar® brand of Skills trusted by millions of Alexa customers.

HOW TO USE:

Enable Forest Night by clicking the "enable" button above, then say "Alexa, open Forest Night".

By default the sound will play in a long loop until you say "Alexa, stop". To set a custom time limit, say "Alexa, set a sleep timer for 6 hours" or any other duration of time while the sound is playing. If you tend to fall asleep quickly and don't want the sounds to play all night, you can change the default play duration to 1 hour by saying "Alexa, loop off" while the sound is playing.

PRO MEMBERSHIP FEATURES:

+ Ad-free experience
+ Premium audio quality 
+ Enhanced looping (no sound gaps for 10 hours instead of 1 hour)

▪▪▪ BEAUTIFUL VISUALS ▪▪▪

Enjoy beautiful animations, a persistent clock, and rich media controls while listening to Forest Night on compatible screen-equipped devices. Turn off visuals and put Forest Night into the background to control smart home devices while Forest Night is playing audio by saying "Alexa, ask Forest Night to turn on Background Mode". You can turn visuals back on at anytime by saying "Alexa, ask Forest Night to turn Background Mode off".

REVIEWS AND FEEDBACK:

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! If you love Forest Night please consider writing a review, or send us an email with your feedback at support@sleepjar.com.
